title: LA-20-10: Analyzing Virtual Events under the Gift Rules
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/88B477D239AB40888525863700756CF3/$FILE/LA-20-10 Analyzing Virtual Events under the Gift Rules.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory addresses recurring questions about the gifts analysis for virtual events. The Legal Advisory clarifies that ethics officials should analyze virtual events under the same framework as in-person events.
